name: paper-char-counter
description: Material Design: Character counter `paper-char-counter` adds a character counter for paper input fields with a character restriction in place. Example: Theming ------- `paper-char-counter` uses `paper-input-decorator`'s error `core-style` for global theming.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: The id of the textinput or textarea that should be monitored.

attributes.name: showCounter
attributes.description:
If false, don't show the character counter. Used in conjunction with
`paper-input-decorator's` `error` field.
